title: Question for Riot: Dynamic queue rank restrictions
body:
Since Riot has announced that they know they are under serving those who want a way to measure and communicate their individual performance.

Will rank restrictions be taken down for dynamic queue to allow players to create teams that have diverse ranking players in them?

OR

Will the ranked 5's team queue be re-instated to compensate for players wanting to play in a team environment not restricted by rank?

Even if only until any new ranking system is implemented for those who want a way to measure their individual performance.
